title: India Arie, Graham Nash Plan to Leave Spotify, Following Neil Young’s Protest of Joe Rogan
sub_head: Announcements are latest in a string of moves made by other musicians in recent days
body:
Singer-songwriters Graham Nash and India Arie said they plan to pull their music from Spotify Technology SA , following Neil Young in objection to the platform’s star podcaster Joe Rogan.
Their announcements are the latest in a string of similar moves made by other musicians in recent days who say they also are critical of Mr. Rogan.
